arq.ste.symmetric_encryption package

Submodules

arq.ste.symmetric_encryption.aes_symmetric_encryption_scheme module

class AesSymmetricEncryptionScheme

Bases: arq.ste.symmetric_encryption.symmetric_encryption_scheme.SymmetricEncryptionScheme

A symmetric encryption scheme based on AES. Implements the SymmetricEncryptionScheme interface.

encrypt(key: bytes, plaintext: bytes) → bytes

Encrypts a plaintext bytestring with the given key.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with

  • plaintext¶ – the plaintext to encrypt

Returns

the ciphertext

decrypt(key: bytes, ciphertext: bytes) → bytes

Decrypts a ciphertext previously encrypted with the given key in a call to encrypt().

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to decrypt with

  • ciphertext¶ – the ciphertext to decrypt

Returns

bytes representing a key

arq.ste.symmetric_encryption.simple_symmetric_encryption_scheme module

class SimpleSymmetricEncryptionScheme

Bases: arq.ste.symmetric_encryption.symmetric_encryption_scheme.SymmetricEncryptionScheme

A simple symmetric encryption scheme using primitives from the simple crypto module. Implements the SymmetricEncryptionScheme interface.

  • key¶ – the key to decrypt with

  • ciphertext¶ – the ciphertext to decrypt

Returns

bytes representing a key

arq.ste.symmetric_encryption.symmetric_encryption_scheme module

class SymmetricEncryptionScheme

Bases: abc.ABC

A SymmetricEncryptionScheme is a interface used to pass specific symmetric encryption schemes to other cryptographic objects, such as an EncryptedMultimapScheme.

abstract encrypt(key: bytes, plaintext: bytes) → bytes

Encrypts a plaintext bytestring with the given key.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with

  • plaintext¶ – the plaintext to encrypt

Returns

the ciphertext

abstract decrypt(key: bytes, plaintext: bytes) → bytes

Decrypts a ciphertext previously encrypted with the given key in a call to encrypt().

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to decrypt with

  • ciphertext¶ – the ciphertext to decrypt

Returns

bytes representing a key

Bases: abc.ABC

A SymmetricEncryptionScheme is a interface used to pass specific symmetric encryption schemes to other cryptographic objects, such as an EncryptedMultimapScheme.
